name: Freshservice
natural_language_description: 这是 Freshservice 节点。主要用于: Consume the Freshservice API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: agent

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many tickets

email.name: email
email.description: Email address of the ticket author
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: Email address of the ticket author | (必填项)

firstName.name: firstName
firstName.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | (必填项)

roles.name: roles
roles.description: Role to assign to the agent
roles.natural_language_description: 参数名: Roles | 作用: Role to assign to the agent | 默认值: {} | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: cc_emails (值: None) - Comma-separated email addresses to add in the CC field of the ticket email
department_id (值: None) - ID of the department to which this ticket belongs. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
group_id (值: None) - ID of the group to which the ticket has been assigned. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
name (值: None) - Name of the ticket author
requester_id (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

agentId.name: agentId
agentId.description: ID of the agent to update
agentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Agent ID | 作用: ID of the agent to update | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: agent_id (值: None) - ID of the agent to whom the tickets have been assigned. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
group_id (值: None) - ID of the group to which the tickets have been assigned. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
created_at (值: None) - Date when the ticket was created
due_by (值: None) - Date when the ticket is due to be resolved

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: department_id (值: None) - ID of the department to which this ticket has been assigned. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
email (值: None) - Email address of the ticket author
group_id (值: None) - ID of the group to which the ticket has been assigned. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
name (值: None) - Name of the ticket author
priority (值: None) - Priority of the ticket

agentGroupId.name: agentGroupId
agentGroupId.description: ID of the agent group to update
agentGroupId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Agent Group ID | 作用: ID of the agent group to update | (必填项)

agentRoleId.name: agentRoleId
agentRoleId.description: ID of the agent role to retrieve
agentRoleId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Agent Role ID | 作用: ID of the agent role to retrieve | (必填项)

bodyHtml.name: bodyHtml
bodyHtml.natural_language_description: 参数名: Body | 作用: HTML supported | (必填项)

visibility.name: visibility
visibility.natural_language_description: 参数名: Visibility | 默认值: everyone | (必填项)
